name: swc-mission-board
description: A mission board third party tool for the star wars combine online browser game

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build:spa && cd ..
scripts.lint:client: cd client && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
